full_output.summary: Dedicated and detailed-oriented B.Tech Computer Science student at SRM University AP,actively seeking opportunities to apply theoretical knowledge in real-world scenarios. Eager to contribute to innovative projects and further develop skills in programming, web development, and database management.

projects.name: Hostel Management System using C++
projects.description: Hostel Management System is a software application designed to efficiently manage various tasks and activities within a hostel or a similar accommodation facility. It helps streamline processes such as room allocation, fee management, attendance tracking, and overall administration. Using C++ for developing such a system provides a robust, efficient, and flexible solution.

projects.name: Privacy and security enhancement in healthcare system
projects.description: Using Machine Learning algorithm, Federating Learning and Blockchain. In the healthcare industry, maintaining the privacy and security of sensitive patient data is of utmost importance. Blockchain technology, with its decentralized and immutable nature, offers a promising solution to address these concerns. By storing healthcare data on a blockchain, it becomes tamper-proof and transparent, ensuring that only authorized individuals can access and modify it.

projects.name: Ethereum Decentralized Voting Application
projects.description: Ethereum Decentralized Voting App utilizes blockchain for secure, transparent, and tamper-proof voting. Smart contracts handle voting processes, ensuring trust and anonymity. Users can cast votes from anywhere, enhancing accessibility. The application revolutionizes democratic processes by enabling fair and verifiable elections on the Ethereum network.

experiences.description: Interned at APSSDC, contributing to a Django-based web development project. Implemented features, collaborated on database management, and gained experience in troubleshooting. Developed on Online Job Portal project, showcasing proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Django. Successfully deployed the platform, demonstrating skills in user authentication, job listing, and responsive design.
